SUBJECT: Ifeanyi - Mira Technologies development

Hi Ifeanyi,

I've been following companies in the information technology & services space.

I'm David Ariyo, a Full Stack Developer. I recently built Dassage Communication Platform - Real-time messaging with video calls, file sharing, WebSocket architecture

Tech: React, Node.js, MongoDB, WebSocket | Scale: 100+ concurrent users

Would you be open to a brief chat if Mira Technologies ever needs freelance development support?

Best regards,
David Ariyo
Full Stack Developer
